file.name: gov.bc.ca-geomark-4.1.2-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - description: Production
    url: https://apps.gov.bc.ca/pub/geomark
  - description: Test
    url: https://test.apps.gov.bc.ca/pub/geomark
  - description: Delivery
    url: https://delivery.apps.gov.bc.ca/pub/geomark
info:
  contact:
    email: IDDDBCLS@Victoria1.gov.bc.ca
    name: DataBC
    url: http://data.gov.bc.ca/
  description: >-
    The Geomark Web Service allows you to create and share geographic areas of
    interest over the web in a variety of formats and coordinate systems. This
    service is especially helpful when you need to share an area of interest
    with people who require that the data be in a different format, or they use
    different mapping software. 


    Please note that you may experience issues when submitting requests to the delivery or test environment if using this [OpenAPI specification](https://github.com/bcgov/api-specs) in other API console viewers.
  license:
    name: Open Government License - British Columbia
    url: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content?id=A519A56BC2BF44E4A008B33FCF527F61
  termsOfService: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content?id=D1EE0A405E584363B205CD4353E02C88
  title: GeoMark Web Service
  version: 4.1.2
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - open_data
  x-logo:
    url: https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/916280?v=3&s=200
  x-origin:
    - converter:
        url: https://github.com/lucybot/api-spec-converter
        version: 2.7.31
      format: openapi
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcgov/api-specs/master/geomark/geomark.json
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: gov.bc.ca
  x-serviceName: geomark
externalDocs:
  description: Geomark Web Service
  url: https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content?id=F6BAF45131954020BCFD2EBCC456F084
tags:
  - name: create
  - name: boundingBox
  - name: feature
  - name: info
  - name: parts
  - name: point
paths:
  /geomarks/copy:
    post:
      description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl
        parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
      parameters:
        - description: One or more geomark URLs or identifiers to create the new geomark
            from.
          example: https://apps.gov.bc.ca/pub/geomark/geomarks/gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: query
          name: geomarkUrl
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format the geomark info resource should be returned using.
          example: json
          in: query
          name: resultFormat
          required: false
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: Select this option to allow overlapping geometries
          in: query
          name: allowOverlap
          required: false
          schema:
            default: false
            enum:
              - false
              - true
            type: boolean
        - description: The callback function a JSON result format would be wrapped in to
            support Ajax requests.
          in: query
          name: callback
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The optional external URL to redirect the user to when the geomark
            is created rather than showing the geomark info page. The geomarkId
            and geomarkUrl query string parameters will be added to the
            redirectUrl so that the target application gets a reference to the
            geomark.
          in: query
          name: redirectUrl
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The url to redirect if the geomark could not be created. The URL
            will include a <fieldName>_Error parameter with the error message
            for the field that caused the error.
          in: query
          name: failureRedirectUrl
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The amount to buffer the geometry in metres, must only contain
            numerical digits (e.g 10). Leave blank and no buffer will be added
            to input geometries. If blank then any Point, LineString, MultiPoint
            and MultiLineString geometries will be ignored.
          in: query
          name: bufferMetres
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: If bufferMetres is specified, The style of buffer to use for joins
            between the line segments for lines and polygons.
          in: query
          name: bufferJoin
          required: false
          schema:
            default: ROUND
            enum:
              - ROUND
              - MITRE
              - BEVEL
            type: string
        - description: If bufferMetres is specified, The style of buffer to use at the ends
            of a buffered line.
          in: query
          name: bufferCap
          required: false
          schema:
            default: ROUND
            enum:
              - ROUND
              - SQUARE
              - FLAT
            type: string
        - description: If bufferMetres is specified, the maximum ratio of distance from the
            original geometry to a mitre buffer point and the buffer amount. If
            the ratio is greater than this a bevel will be used instead. This
            prevents infinite distances when the angle between the two lines at
            a join is small. Must be > 0.
          in: query
          name: bufferMitreLimit
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 5
            type: integer
        - description: If bufferMetres is specified, the number of line segments used in
            each quadrant to approximate the curve for round end-cap and join
            styles. Must be > 0.
          in: query
          name: bufferSegments
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 8
            type: integer
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Couldn't create geomark.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Create a new geomark by copying the geometries from one or more existing
        geomarks from the current server.
      tags:
        - create
  /geomarks/new:
    post:
      description: Create a new geomark from the geometries read from the 'body' parameter
        or file.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              properties:
                allowOverlap:
                  default: false
                  description: When multiple=true select this option to allow overlapping
                    geometries
                  enum:
                    - false
                    - true
                  type: boolean
                body:
                  description: The binary or character content representing the geometry or
                    geometries
                  type: string
                bufferCap:
                  default: ROUND
                  description: If bufferMetres is specified, The style of buffer to use at
                    the ends of a buffered line.
                  enum:
                    - ROUND
                    - SQUARE
                    - FLAT
                  type: string
                bufferJoin:
                  default: ROUND
                  description: If bufferMetres is specified, The style of buffer to use for
                    joins between the line segments for lines and polygons.
                  enum:
                    - ROUND
                    - MITRE
                    - BEVEL
                  type: string
                bufferMetres:
                  description: The amount to buffer the geometry in metres, must only
                    contain numerical digits (e.g 10). Leave blank and no buffer
                    will be added to input geometries. If blank then any Point,
                    LineString, MultiPoint and MultiLineString geometries will
                    be ignored.
                  type: integer
                bufferMitreLimit:
                  default: 5
                  description: If bufferMetres is specified, the maximum ratio of distance
                    from the original geometry to a mitre buffer point and the
                    buffer amount. If the ratio is greater than this a bevel
                    will be used instead. This prevents infinite distances when
                    the angle between the two lines at a join is small. Must be
                    > 0.
                  type: integer
                bufferSegments:
                  default: 8
                  description: If bufferMetres is specified, the number of line segments
                    used in each quadrant to approximate the curve for round
                    end-cap and join styles. Must be > 0.
                  type: integer
                callback:
                  description: The callback function a JSON result format would be wrapped
                    in to support Ajax requests.
                  type: string
                failureRedirectUrl:
                  description: The url to redirect if the geomark could not be created. The
                    URL will include a <fieldName>_Error parameter with the
                    error message for the field that caused the error.
                  type: string
                format:
                  description: The file format name extension of the input geometry.
                  enum:
                    - json
                    - xml
                    - kml
                    - kmz
                    - shp
                    - shpz
                    - geojson
                    - gml
                    - wkt
                  type: string
                multiple:
                  default: false
                  description: Boolean flag indicating if multiple geometries are to be
                    used for the geomark (true) or only a single geometry from
                    the first geometry (false).
                  enum:
                    - false
                    - true
                  type: boolean
                redirectUrl:
                  description: The optional external URL to redirect the user to when the
                    geomark is created rather than showing the geomark info
                    page. The geomarkId and geomarkUrl query string parameters
                    will be added to the redirectUrl so that the target
                    application gets a reference to the geomark.
                  type: string
                resultFormat:
                  description: The file format the geomark info resource should be returned
                    using.
                  enum:
                    - json
                    - xml
                    - kml
                    - kmz
                    - shp
                    - shpz
                    - geojson
                    - gml
                    - wkt
                  type: string
                srid:
                  default: 4326
                  description: The srid of the coordinate system the input geometries are
                    in. If the file includes a coordinate system definition that
                    will be used.
                  enum:
                    - 4326
                    - 3005
                    - 3857
                    - 26907
                    - 26908
                    - 26909
                    - 26910
                    - 26911
                  type: integer
              type: object
      responses:
        "302":
          description: If the geomark was created and a redirectUrl was specified then the
            response will redirect to the redirectUrl with the query string
            parameters geomarkId and geomarkUrl of the created geomark. If the
            geomark was created and a redirectUrl was NOT specified then the
            response will redirect to the geomark info resource of the created
            geomark. If resultFormat was specified then the redirect will be to
            the geomark info resource for that file format. If the resultFormat
            was 'json' and a callback was specified the the callback query
            string parameter will be added to the URL. If there was an error
            creating the geomark and a failureRedirectUrl was specified then the
            response will be redirected to the failureRedirectUrl with a
            <fieldName>_Error query string parameter with the error message.
            Otherwise one of the 400 status codes below will be returned.
        "400":
          description: Couldn't create geomark.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Create a new geomark
      tags:
        - create
  "/geomarks/{geomarkId}.{fileFormatExtension}":
    get:
      description: The attribution can be downloaded as a info file format. The download
        files can then be processed by a client application to access the
        geomark info fields and to get the URLs to the geometry download
        resources.
      parameters:
        - description: The unique identifier for the geomark.
          example: gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: path
          name: geomarkId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format name extension used to represent the geomark
            download.
          example: json
          in: path
          name: fileFormatExtension
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: The srid of the coordinate system the geometry should be converted
            to.
          in: query
          name: srid
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 4326
            enum:
              - 4326
              - 3005
              - 3857
              - 26907
              - 26908
              - 26909
              - 26910
              - 26911
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The geomark will be returned in the body of the HTTP response
            encoded in the requested file format.
        "400":
          description: Coordinate system with srid = <srid> is not supported.
        "404":
          description: The geomark <geomarkId> could not be found.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Get information about a particular geomark
      tags:
        - info
  "/geomarks/{geomarkId}/boundingBox.{fileFormatExtension}":
    get:
      description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl
        parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
      parameters:
        - description: The unique identifier for the geomark
          example: gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: path
          name: geomarkId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format name extension used to represent the geomark
            download.
          example: json
          in: path
          name: fileFormatExtension
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: The srid of the coordinate system the geometry should be converted
            to.
          in: query
          name: srid
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 4326
            enum:
              - 4326
              - 3005
              - 3857
              - 26907
              - 26908
              - 26909
              - 26910
              - 26911
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The geomark will be returned in the body of the HTTP response
            encoded in the requested file format.
        "400":
          description: Coordinate system with srid = <srid> is not supported.
        "404":
          description: The geomark <geomarkId> could not be found.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Gets the bounding box of the geomark
      tags:
        - boundingBox
  "/geomarks/{geomarkId}/feature.{fileFormatExtension}":
    get:
      description: The geomark feature resource returns a single spatial feature with
        either a single (Point, LineString, Polygon) or multi-part geometry
        (MultiPoint, MultiLineString, MultiPolygon) and the geomark
        attribution.  The geometry and attribution can be downloaded as a
        spatial download file format in a supported coordinate system. The
        download files can then be used in a desktop GIS application (e.g.
        ArcMap), Google Earth or a web mapping application.
      parameters:
        - description: The unique identifier for the geomark
          example: gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: path
          name: geomarkId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format name extension used to represent the geomark
            download.
          example: json
          in: path
          name: fileFormatExtension
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: The srid of the coordinate system the geometry should be converted
            to.
          in: query
          name: srid
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 4326
            enum:
              - 4326
              - 3005
              - 3857
              - 26907
              - 26908
              - 26909
              - 26910
              - 26911
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The geomark will be returned in the body of the HTTP response
            encoded in the requested file format.
        "400":
          description: Coordinate system with srid = <srid> is not supported.
        "404":
          description: The geomark <geomarkId> could not be found.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Get the feature and attribution of the geomark
      tags:
        - feature
  "/geomarks/{geomarkId}/parts.{fileFormatExtension}":
    get:
      description: The geomark parts resource returns a one or more spatial features. One
        for each part of the Geomark's geomerty. Each part contains a single
        (Point, LineString, Polygon) geometry and the geomark attribution.
      parameters:
        - description: The unique identifier for the geomark
          example: gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: path
          name: geomarkId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format name extension used to represent the geomark
            download.
          example: json
          in: path
          name: fileFormatExtension
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: The srid of the coordinate system the geometry should be converted
            to.
          in: query
          name: srid
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 4326
            enum:
              - 4326
              - 3005
              - 3857
              - 26907
              - 26908
              - 26909
              - 26910
              - 26911
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The geomark will be returned in the body of the HTTP response
            encoded in the requested file format.
        "400":
          description: Coordinate system with srid = <srid> is not supported.
        "404":
          description: The geomark <geomarkId> could not be found.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Get the individual geometries within a multi-part geometry
      tags:
        - parts
  "/geomarks/{geomarkId}/point.{fileFormatExtension}":
    get:
      description: The geomark point resource returns a single spatial feature with a
        single Point and the geomark attribution.  The point geometry will be
        created from the first geometry part of the Geomark. Point geomarks will
        return the first Point part in the geomark.  LineString geomarks will
        return the first coordinate of the first LineString part in the geomark.
        Polygon geomarks will return the centroid or another point inside the
        first Polygon part in the geomark. The geometry and attribution can be
        downloaded as a spatial download file format in a supported coordinate
        system. The download files can then be used in a desktop GIS application
        (e.g. ArcMap), Google Earth or a web mapping application.
      parameters:
        - description: The unique identifier for the geomark.
          example: gm-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv0bcislands
          in: path
          name: geomarkId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: The file format name extension used to represent the geomark
            download.
          example: json
          in: path
          name: fileFormatExtension
          required: true
          schema:
            enum:
              - json
              - xml
              - kml
              - kmz
              - shp
              - shpz
              - geojson
              - gml
              - wkt
            type: string
        - description: The srid of the coordinate system the geometry should be converted
            to.
          in: query
          name: srid
          required: false
          schema:
            default: 4326
            enum:
              - 4326
              - 3005
              - 3857
              - 26907
              - 26908
              - 26909
              - 26910
              - 26911
            type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The geomark will be returned in the body of the HTTP response
            encoded in the requested file format.
        "400":
          description: Coordinate system with srid = <srid> is not supported.
        "404":
          description: The geomark <geomarkId> could not be found.
        "500":
          description: Internal Server Error.
      summary: Gets a single spatial point representative of the geomark.
      tags:
        - point
components:
  schemas: {}
